title: #14 Allegra Frank (Slate): S**tposting, Instagram art, ice cube role-playing
itunes:title: Allegra Frank (Slate): S**tposting, Instagram art, ice cube role-playing
description:
Slate senior editor Allegra Frank usually writes about things that have a big cultural footprint — movies like Godzilla vs. Kong, or TV shows like the Falcon and the Winter Soldier. But one of her all-time favorite social media accounts has only 45 followers and hasn't posted in two years. 
 "I've read their entire Twitter feed many times," she says. 
 On today's episode, Frank also talks with Eric Johnson about her love of s**tposting, endearing comedy videos, Instagram art, and more. 
https://followfridaypodcast.com/allegra-frank (Read a full transcript of this episode here)
Follow us:
- Allegra is https://twitter.com/legsfrank (@legsfrank) on Twitter, and her podcast is @awylatt on https://twitter.com/awylatt (Twitter) and https://www.twitch.tv/awylatt (Twitch)
- This show is @followfridaypod on https://twitter.com/followfridaypod (Twitter) and https://www.instagram.com/followfridaypod/ (Instagram)
- Eric is https://twitter.com/heyheyesj (@heyheyesj) on Twitter
Who Allegra follows:
- https://twitter.com/raysipe/ (Ray Sipe) (watch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oey4pS_Vh5o (the Shrek video))
- https://twitter.com/GraceGFreud (Grace Freud )
- https://www.instagram.com/kwon__julie/ (Julie Kwon) (check out https://www.instagram.com/p/CAQxQh2DrWW/ (Allegra's favorite drawing))
- https://twitter.com/georgeicecube1 (George Ice Cube)
Donate to Trans Lifeline: https://translifeline.org/ (TransLifeline.org)
Rate us: https://lovethepodcast.com/FollowFriday (LoveThePodcast.com/FollowFriday)
Advertise: https://followfridaypodcast.com/advertise (FollowFridayPodcast.com/Advertise)
Theme song written by Eric Johnson, and performed by https://www.fiverr.com/yonamarie (Yona Marie). Show art by https://www.fiverr.com/dodiihr (Dodi Hermawan). Additional music by https://www.purple-planet.com/ (Purple Planet Music).

Slate senior editor Allegra Frank usually writes about things that have a big cultural footprint — movies like Godzilla vs. Kong, or TV shows like the Falcon and the Winter Soldier. But one of her all-time favorite social media accounts has only 45 followers and hasn't posted in two years.

"I've read their entire Twitter feed many times," she says.

On today's episode, Frank also talks with Eric Johnson about her love of s**tposting, endearing comedy videos, Instagram art, and more.

Slate senior editor Allegra Frank usually writes about things that have a big cultural footprint — movies like Godzilla vs. Kong, or TV shows like the Falcon and the Winter Soldier. But one of her all-time favorite social media accounts has only 45 followers and hasn't posted in two years.
